divs: Sighting DetailsFor those in Naples that have posted here I just want to let you know that there are others of us here that see them also. This is on going and has been occuring for us for the last year. Watch the skies. It starts after dark. You will see the lights moving all over the sky and never alone. We have seen up to ten at a time. They are not satellites as they come in groups and move in different patterns. Captiva Island residents keep seeing them and they are being told lies. They are very present here. Keep watching!!!
trends: There have been 34 other sightings in Naples
There were 2 other sightings in Naples on or around March 31st 2010
Summary: Lights in the sky that are not satellites. Moving in all directions coming in groups, appearing and disappearing just to reapearing again. They grow and change shapes.
